workflow.meta: 利益冲突审查流程(权益类)

function.name: abs.Expression
function.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var a=ABS_LOADBEAN("com.apex.bss.mod.gdzqWorkflowWebservice.workflowSamples.InternalDocumentsJavabean");
var oaid=a.creatWorkFlow("lcIB_LYCTSC_QY",O_WORKFLOW.ID,O_WORKFLOW.XMMC.ID,$Login.User,'100000');
var ret = LB_sqlProcedure("{call ecif.pro_ib_oaresulthandle(:ral{int},:ret,?,?,?,?)}",[oaid,O_WORKFLOW.ID,"lcIB_LYCTSC_QY",$Login.User]); 
ABS_SETRETNOTE(ret.get('ret'));
if(ret.get('ral')>0){
	true;
}else{
	false;
}

function.name: lb.Assert
function.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var status=ABS_SQLVALUE("select status from ECIF.tib_oawfhandle where upper(lcbd)=upper('lcIB_LYCTSC_QY') and lcbdid=?",[O_WORKFLOW.ID]);
status==1

function.name: abs.Expression
function.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var s=ABS_SQLVALUE("SELECT COUNT(1) FROM JGCRM.OS_CURRENTSTEP T,JGCRM.LBWFCURRENTOWNER A WHERE T.ID = A.STEPID AND T.ENTRY_ID = ? AND T.STEP_ID = 69 AND A.OWNER = ?",[O_WORKFLOW.InstID,$Login.User]);
if (s>0){
LB_workAction("lcIB_LYCTSC_QY",O_WORKFLOW.ID,70,"");
ABS_flushObjCache('WORKFLOW.TASK')
}
